titleStmt.title: The siege of Antwerp. Written in Latin by Famianus Strada, Englished by Tho: Lancaster, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Strada, Famiano, 1572-1649.
Lancaster, Thomas, gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.W. for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Prince's Armes in St Paules Churchyard.,

notesStmt.note: Chronograph: "DeVM Cole" [i.e. 1655] follows Tho: Lancaster, Gent. on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the Prince's Armes in St Paules Churchyard.
